data.title: 按钮组件
data.summary: 该组件支持页面右上角定义【分享，链接，预约功能】 同时，支持热区拖拽得到相关功能
data.dataSchema: {"type":"object","description":"组件配置","properties":{"bakeryCurrentScene":{"key":"bakeryCurrentScene","type":"enum","description":"MOCK 预览场景","items":[{"label":"取消预约失败-已预约过","value":"bakery-53d66d8898847ea659318d25002d5df298847ea68fc7"},{"label":"取消预约成功-已预约过","value":"bakery-53d66d8898847ea66210529f002d5df298847ea68fc7"},{"label":"查询已预约过","value":"bakery-67e58be25df298847ea68fc7"},{"label":"查询未预约过","value":"bakery-67e58be2672a98847ea68fc7"},{"label":"预约失败-未预约过","value":"bakery-98847ea659318d25002d672a98847ea68fc7"},{"label":"预约成功-未预约过","value":"bakery-98847ea66210529f002d672a98847ea68fc7"}]},"bakeryProjectInfo":{"key":"bakeryProjectInfo","type":"object","description":"组件信息（请勿改动）","properties":{"projectName":{"key":"projectName","type":"string","description":"包名"},"projectVersion":{"key":"projectVersion","type":"string","description":"版本号"}},"meta":{"if":"false"}},"type":{"key":"type","type":"enum","description":"按钮形式","items":[{"label":"页面右上角按钮","value":"right"},{"label":"热区按钮","value":"hot"}]},"spm":{"key":"spm","type":"string","description":"点击埋点"},"rule":{"key":"rule","type":"string","description":"展示的人群规则，不填则全人群展示","meta":{"regExp":"/^$|^[A-Za-z0-9]{32}$/","errorMsg":"规则长度为32位或空！"}},"monitor":{"key":"monitor","type":"boolean","description":"是否监听签约完成事件"},"showState":{"key":"showState","type":"string","description":"接收的事件"},"actionType":{"key":"actionType","type":"enum","description":"按钮操作类型","items":[{"label":"预约","value":"reserve"},{"label":"链接","value":"link"},{"label":"分享","value":"share"},{"label":"锚点","value":"anchor"}]},"rightStyle":{"key":"rightStyle","type":"object","description":"右上角样式","properties":{"color":{"key":"color","type":"color","description":"字体颜色"},"text":{"key":"text","type":"string","description":"按钮文案"}},"meta":{"if":"$.type == 'right'"}},"hotStyle":{"key":"hotStyle","type":"object","description":"热区样式","properties":{"image":{"key":"image","type":"image","description":"背景图"},"posSelect":{"key":"posSelect","type":"boolean","description":"是否使用闪蝶热区"},"buttonPos":{"key":"buttonPos","type":"box","description":"热区按钮位置"},"buttonPosition":{"key":"buttonPosition","type":"object","description":"按钮位置","properties":{"left":{"key":"left","type":"number","description":"按钮距离页面左边间距"},"top":{"key":"top","type":"number","description":"按钮距离页面上边间距"},"width":{"key":"width","type":"number","description":"按钮宽度"},"height":{"key":"height","type":"number","description":"按钮高度"}},"meta":{"if":"$.hotStyle.posSelect!= true"}}},"meta":{"if":"$.type == 'hot'"}},"link":{"key":"link","type":"url","description":"按钮链接","meta":{"if":"$.actionType == 'link'"}},"anchor":{"key":"anchor","type":"string","description":"锚点id","meta":{"if":"$.actionType == 'anchor'"}},"reserveConfig":{"key":"reserveConfig","type":"object","description":"预约配置","properties":{"reserveImage":{"key":"reserveImage","type":"image","description":"预约图片"},"cancelReserveImage":{"key":"cancelReserveImage","type":"image","description":"取消预约图片"},"productType":{"key":"productType","type":"string","description":"产品类型"},"activityCode":{"key":"activityCode","type":"string","description":"活动编码"},"serviceCode":{"key":"serviceCode","type":"string","description":"push编码"}},"meta":{"if":"$.actionType == 'reserve'"}},"shareConfig":{"key":"shareConfig","type":"object","description":"分享配置","properties":{"title":{"key":"title","type":"string","description":"分享标题"},"content":{"key":"content","type":"string","description":"分享内容"},"imageUrl":{"key":"imageUrl","type":"image","description":"分享小图"},"imageData":{"key":"imageData","type":"image","description":"分享大图"},"autoMode":{"key":"autoMode","type":"boolean","description":"是否自动生成二维码"}},"meta":{"if":"$.actionType == 'share'"}}}}
data.name: dp-button-action-react
data.document:
01. 说明


  • 页面任意位置，随页面滚动。
  • 有多重功能选择
    • 分享设置
    • 跳转链接
    • 预约功能
    • 锚点


02. 配置项


属性说明类型默认值
type按钮形式'right'【右上角】'hot' 【热区】
spm点击埋点String
rule展示的人群规则，不填则全人群展示String
monitor是否监听签约完成事件Boolean
showState接收的事件String
actionType按钮操作类型String<'reserve''link'
type按钮形式String<'right''hot'>
rightStyle右上角样式(type为right时配置生效)Object
rightStyle.color字体颜色Color
rightStyle.text按钮文字String
hotStyle热区样式(type为hot时配置生效)Object
hotStyle.image背景图Image
hotStyle.posSelect是否使用闪蝶热区Boolean
hotStyle.buttonPos热区按钮位置(hotStyle.posSelect为true时配置生效)Box
hotStyle.buttonPosition按钮位置(hotStyle.posSelect为false时配置生效)Object{ left: number, top: number, width: number, height: number}
link按钮链接(actionType为link时配置生效)Url
reserveConfig预约配置(actionType为reserve时配置生效)Object
reserveConfig.reserveImage预约图片Image
reserveConfig.cancelReserveImage取消预约图片Image
reserveConfig.productType产品类型String
reserveConfig.activityCode活动编码String
reserveConfig.serviceCodepush编码String
shareConfig分享配置(actionType为share时配置生效)Object
shareConfig.title分享标题String
shareConfig.content分享内容String
shareConfig.imageUrl分享小图Image
shareConfig.imageData分享大图Image
shareConfig.autoMode是否自动生成二维码Boolean
data.tags: 悬浮,人群,入口,按钮,魔切,功能

n":"错误码"},"promptType":{"key":"promptType","type":"enum","description":"错误提示类型","items":[{"label":"弹窗","value":"modal"},{"label":"toast","value":"toast"}]},"errorMsg":{"key":"errorMsg","type":"string","description":"错误 data.name: dp-simple-draw-react
data.document:
简单抽奖通用组件

# 使用说明
1. 可设置每月、每周一抽奖或不限抽奖时间段;
2. 可配置已抽奖、抽奖成功、不可抽奖、抽奖背景图等;
3. 可设置抽奖背景图及弹窗宽高样式.

# 效果图
  1.不在抽奖时间段中未抽奖【图1】
  2.在抽奖时间段中未抽奖【图2】
  3.在抽奖时间段中抽奖失败【图3】
  4.在抽奖时间段中抽奖成功【图4】
  5.查询已抽奖信息【图5】
 【图1】:https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_36f410/afts/img/A*-NtUTZQ_1cIAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ
 【图2】:https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_36f410/afts/img/A*da7OQrngtgcAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ
 【图3】:https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_36f410/afts/img/A*kkN_QpdqMzUAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ
 【图4】:https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_36f410/afts/img/A*WCkhSYs19LoAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ
 【图5】:https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_36f410/afts/img/A*h_1qSqSikmEAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ

## 作为普通组件使用

```bash
tnpm install @alipay/dp-simple-draw-react --save 
```

```js
import Component from '@alipay/dp-simple-draw-react'
```

### 在闪蝶模板中使用

```bash
MORPHO=1 tnpm install @alipay/dp-simple-draw-react --save 
```

接着在需要的模板中这样的使用：

```
{% components %}
  {% require 'components/dp-simple-draw-react' %}
{% endcomponents %}
```


# 代码演示
```jsx
import Component from '@alipay/dp-simple-draw-react'
  <Component
    actTime="notlimit"
    monthConfig={1}
    weekConfig={2}
    activityConfig={[
      {
        activityId: "CP15101645",
        actBg: "https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_2e421e/afts/img/A*TjCTRpIjSFQAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ",
        actWidth: 600,
        actHeight: 140,
        hasConfig: {
          bg: "https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_da83a5/afts/img/A*Sq3tRKlcmjEAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ",
          image: "https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_da83a5/afts/img/A*Sq3tRKlcmjEAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ",
          width: 500,
          height: 140
        },
        disableConfig: {
          disableBg: "https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_f8d7cd/afts/img/A*eeuSTJYmT4EAAAAAAAAAAABjARQnAQ"
        },
        errorConfig: {
          errorCode: "",
          errorMsg: "领取失败请重试"
        },
        successConfig: {
          image: "https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_da83a5/afts/img/A*OxaxTqlWEuoAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ",
          width: 500,
          height: 140
        }
      }
    ]}
   />


```


# API
| 属性 | 说明 | 类型 | 默认值 |
| ---- | ---- | ---- | ------ |
| actTime | 可抽奖时间段 | Enum | notlimit |
| monthConfig | 几号抽奖 | Number | 1 |
| weekConfig | 周几抽奖 | Number | 2 |
| activityConfig | 活动相关配置 | Array | [activityConfig] |
| activityConfig.activityId | 活动相关配置 | Array | [] |
| activityConfig.actBg | 抽奖背景图 | Image | 'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_2e421e/afts/img/A*TjCTRpIjSFQAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ' |
| activityConfig.actWidth | 抽奖背景图宽度 | Number | 600 |
| activityConfig.actHeight | 抽奖背景图高度 | Number | 140 |
| activityConfig.hasConfig | 已抽奖配置 | Object | {hasConfig} |
| activityConfig.hasConfig.bg | 页面背景图 | Image | 'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_da83a5/afts/img/A*Sq3tRKlcmjEAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ' |
| activityConfig.hasConfig.image | 活动相关配置 | Array | [] |
| activityConfig.hasConfig.height | 点击弹窗图图片高度 | Number | 140 |
| activityConfig.hasConfig.width | 点击弹窗图图片宽度 | Number | 500 |
| activityConfig.disableConfig | 不可抽奖配置 | Object | {disableConfig} |
| activityConfig.disableConfig.disableBg | 不可抽奖背景图 | Image | 'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_f8d7cd/afts/img/A*eeuSTJYmT4EAAAAAAAAAAABjARQnAQ' |
| activityConfig.errorConfig | 抽奖错误码配置 | Array | [errorConfig] |
| errorConfig.errorCode | 错误码 | String | '' |
| errorConfig.errorMsg | 错误 toast 提示 | String | '领取失败请重试' |
| activityConfig.successConfig | 抽奖成功配置 | Object | {successConfig} |
| activityConfig.successConfig.image | 抽奖弹窗 | Image | 'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_da83a5/afts/img/A*OxaxTqlWEuoAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ' |
| activityConfig.successConfig.width | 抽奖弹窗宽度 | Number | 500 |
| activityConfig.successConfig.height | 抽奖弹窗高度 | Number | 140 |

# 埋点


# Changelog


# Documentation

请移步 [Sherry Component 文档](https://sherry.antfin-inc.com/component/) 了解更多的开发和使用细节。

预览场景","items":[{"label":"cdpFeedback-default","value":"bakery-0063006400700046006500650064006200610063006b002d00640065006600610075006c0074"},{"label":"getCdpSpaceInfo-default","value":"bakery-006700650074004300640070005300700061006300650049006e0066006f002d00640065006600610075006c0074"},{"label":"getCdpSpaceInfo-empty","value":"bakery-006700650074004300640070005300700061006300650049006e0066006f002d0065006d007000740079"},{"label":"getCdpSpaceInfo-oneData","value":"bakery-006700650074004300640070005300700061006300650049006e0066006f002d006f006e00650044006100740061"}]},"bakeryProjectInfo":{"key":"bakeryProjectInfo","type":"object","description":"组件信息（请勿改动）","properties":{"projectName":{"key":"projectName","type":"string","description":"包名"},"projectVersion":{"key":"projectVersion","type":"string","description":"版本号"}},"meta":{"if":"false"}},"cdpSpaceCode":{"key":"cdpSpaceCode","type":"string","description":"imatch配置"},"fallbackCdpImage":{"key":"fallbackCdpImage","type":"image","description":"兜底配置图片,如果不填写则没有数据的时候区块不展示"},"width":{"key":"width","type":"number","description":"宽"},"height":{"key":"height","type":"number","description":"高"},"marginTop":{"key":"marginTop","type":"number","description":"距离上一个模块的间距"},"marginBottom":{"key":"marginBottom","type":"number","description":"距离下一个模块的间距"},"spmc":{"key":"spmc","type":"string","description":"spmc"},"loop":{"key":"loop","type":"boolean","description":"是否循环","meta":{"default":true}},"needRadius":{"key":"needRadius","type":"boolean","description":"是否开启圆角？","meta":{"default":true}},"needSpaceBetweenBanner":{"key":"needSpaceBetweenBanner","type":"boolean","description":"banner间是否有间距?","meta":{"default":true}},"paginationColorTheme":{"key":"paginationColorTheme","type":"enum","description":"pagination分页器颜色主题，默认蓝色","items":[{"label":"蓝色","value":"blue"},{"label":"白色","value":"white"}],"meta":{"multiple":false,"default":"blue"}},"logCode":{"key":"logCode","type":"number","description":"监控码，默认12","meta":{"default":12}},"showState":{"key":"showState","type":"string","description":"区块展示事件名，默认不处理。当监听到该事件后再展示","meta":{"default":""}},"immediately":{"key":"immediately","type":"boolean","description":"是否禁用缓存，直接从服务器拉取","meta":{"default":false}}}}
data.name: dp-imatch-banner-react
data.document:
01. 说明


banner轮播，接的 海豚的 imatch投放。


imatch 是可以怎么建，参考： https://yuque.antfin-inc.com/fka7t3/wqvtow/nflxad


建立过程中有问题可参考：https://yuque.antfin-inc.com/docs/share/ff5edefb-332a-4728-b080-57f04fbee60c?# 《运营⚠️》


参考样式：【banner 的个数和内容是在海豚里面进行配置】

示例：花呗频道首页


02. 状态


imatch 轮播


03. 皮肤配置


图片尺寸，图片距离上下组件的间距，轮播的圆点的颜色，是否可循环等


04. 配置项


属性说明类型默认值
cdpSpaceCodeimatch配置展位码string''
fallbackCdpImage兜底配置图片，展位码获取不到数据时进行展示，不配置当没有数据时不展示string''
width图片宽【 px 】

number

700
height

图片高 【 px 】

number210
marginTop

距离上一个模块的间距【px】

number

0

marginBottom

距离下一个模块的间距【px】

number

0

spm埋点 【方便在闪蝶里看对应埋点数据】string''
loop是否循环播放Booleantrue
needRadius是否开启圆角Booleantrue
needSpaceBetweenBannerbanner间是否有间距，用于样式调整true
paginationColorTheme分页器颜色主题，默认蓝色。可选 blue, whitestring'blue'
logCode监控码 【开发关心】Number12
immediately是否禁用缓存，直接从服务器拉取 【开发关心】Booleanfalse

data.name: dp-oasis-modal-react
data.document:
暂无描述

# 使用说明

## 作为普通组件使用

```bash
tnpm install @alipay/dp-oasis-modal-react --save 
```

```js
import Component from '@alipay/dp-oasis-modal-react'
```

### 在闪蝶模板中使用

```bash
MORPHO=1 tnpm install @alipay/dp-oasis-modal-react --save 
```

接着在需要的模板中这样的使用：

```
{% components %}
  {% require 'components/dp-oasis-modal-react' %}
{% endcomponents %}
```
